title: Quiet Cabinet Drawer Stops
summary: Stop cabinet slams with soft-close bumpers and felt pads.

fitCheck.question: Are you allowed to add adhesive bumpers?
Do you want a quick, renter-safe fix?

items.name: Felt pad roll
items.why: Trim to fit drawer fronts and rails.

items.name: Cabinet door dampers
items.why: Adds extra hush to door swings.

removalNotes: Use mild cleaner to remove residue
steps: Clean the drawer front and cabinet frame.
Apply bumpers near the top corners of the frame.
Add felt pads where wood meets wood.
Test close and adjust bumper placement if needed.
mistakes: Placing bumpers too close to hinges can prevent full closure.
Skipping cleaning causes bumpers to peel.

faqs.a: Most bumpers remove cleanly with gentle twisting and warm water.
